trans-unit.source: Provides a set of methods for identifying inherited components.
trans-unit.target: 提供一组用于标识继承的组件的方法。

trans-unit.source: The InheritanceService can be used to find inherited components, select which ones to ignore, and retrieve the inheritance attribute of each inherited class that is tracked by the service.
trans-unit.target: InheritanceService 可用来找到继承的组件、 选择哪些若要忽略，并检索由服务跟踪每个继承的类的继承属性。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Adds the components inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将添加到指定的组件由继承的组件<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the fields of all base classes of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 此方法搜索指定组件的所有基类的所有的字段。

trans-unit.source: Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 实现每个字段<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>添加到指定的容器。</xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索要添加到指定的容器的继承组件的组件。

trans-unit.source: The container to add the inherited components to.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到继承的组件的容器。

trans-unit.source: Adds the components of the specified type that are inherited by the specified component to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 将继承为其的指定组件的指定类型的组件添加<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method searches all the fields of all base classes of component.
trans-unit.target: 此方法搜索组件的所有基类的所有的字段。

trans-unit.source: Each field that implements <xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent> is added to an internal list that stores an <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> that identifies the inheritance level of the component.
trans-unit.target: 实现每个字段<xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>添加到存储的内部列表<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>标识继承级别的组件。</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute> </xref:System.ComponentModel.IComponent>

trans-unit.source: The component is then added to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该组件被添加到指定的容器。

trans-unit.source: The base type to search for.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索的基类型。

trans-unit.source: The component to search for inherited components to add to the specified container.
trans-unit.target: 要搜索要添加到指定的容器的继承组件的组件。

trans-unit.source: The container to add the inherited components to.
trans-unit.target: 要添加到继承的组件的容器。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 释放使用的所有资源<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Calling Dispose allows the resources used by the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> to be reallocated for other purposes.
trans-unit.target: 调用 Dispose 允许使用的资源<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>可以重新分配用于其他目的。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>

trans-unit.source: For more information about Dispose, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关释放的详细信息，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由非托管的资源<xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService"> </xref> ，还可以释放托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()`method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此方法称为由公共`Dispose()`方法和<xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>方法。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService> references.
trans-unit.target: 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此<xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>引用。</xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.InheritanceService>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: 此方法调用`Dispose()`每个引用对象的方法。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>若要释放托管和非托管资源;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>若要仅释放非托管的资源。

trans-unit.source: Gets the inheritance attribute of the specified component.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定组件的继承属性。

trans-unit.source: If the component is not inherited, this method returns the value <xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>.
trans-unit.target: 如果组件不能继承，此方法将返回值<xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>.</xref:System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, it returns the inheritance attribute for this component.
trans-unit.target: 否则，它将返回此组件的继承属性。

trans-unit.source: The component to retrieve the inheritance attribute for.
trans-unit.target: 要检索的继承属性的组件。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"></xref> that describes the level of inheritance that this component comes from.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.InheritanceAttribute"> </xref>描述此组件所来自的继承的级别。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether to ignore the specified member.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否忽略指定的成员。

trans-unit.source: The member to check.
trans-unit.target: 要检查的成员。

trans-unit.source: This member is either a <xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo> or a <xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是其中一种<xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>或一种<xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo>。</xref:System.Reflection.MethodInfo> </xref:System.Reflection.FieldInfo>

trans-unit.source: The component instance this member is bound to.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是绑定到组件实例。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified member should be included in the set of inherited components; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定的成员应包括继承的组件; 集中否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
